about_the_game:
Fly with a flock of birds in this cozy game with several single and multi-player modes. The game is meant to be pretty, relaxing, and dare we say meditative? Well, you can shoot some birds, too, if you want. So there's that.

Pop It (single player and local multi player modes): you fly one on the birds in the flock - pulling the birds along with you - as you pop balloons.  A balloon scores more points based on how many birds you've drawn near the balloon.  With local multi player, you work together cooperatively.

Hunt It (local multi player mode): one player is the hunter while the other players are birds hidden in the flock.  The players who control the birds must covertly figure out which bird they are controlling, and then tap balloons without the hunter figuring out who they are.  The hunter has a limited number of bullet to shoot birds, with the goal of shooting down all of the birds controlled by players.

Hunt it (single player mode): you progress through stage after stage as you hit the number of targets required to continue on to the next round.  Enjoy some peaceful bonus rounds between the harder and harder stages as you shoot your way to a high score.

Capture It (local multi player mode): each player controls a different colored bird.  Flying over any flocking bird (other than a player-controlled one) will turn that bird to your color, and will increase your bird's influence over the flock.  Turn as many birds possible to your color to win.

Local multiplayer requires the use of game controllers.

More modes are on the way!  We are planning a longer, single-player journey mode where you take the flock on a longer quest while keeping your flock intact.

Please let us know your ideas for more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 560 (4GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11600K or AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT (8GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
